thread.title: Seven inmates dead after South Carolina prison riot

title: Seven inmates dead after South Carolina prison riot
text:
Seven inmates dead after South Carolina prison riot 2:25pm EDT - 00:35 
Seven South Carolina prison inmates were stabbed to death and 17 others injured in an eight-hour-long riot Sunday night, that stands as the deadliest in the United States since 1993. Jillian Kitchener reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Seven South Carolina prison inmates were stabbed to death and 17 others injured in an eight-hour-long riot Sunday night, that stands as the deadliest in the United States since 1993.
